member.name: TF_DA_LINESTYLE
member.summary: Elements of the TF_DA_LINESTYLE enumeration specify the underline style of a display attribute in the structure.

member.name: TF_DA_LINESTYLE.TF_LS_SOLID
member.summary: The text is underlined with a solid line.

member.name: TF_DA_LINESTYLE.TF_LS_DOT
member.summary: The text is underlined with a dotted line.

member.name: TF_DA_LINESTYLE.TF_LS_DASH
member.summary: The text is underlined with a dashed line.

member.name: TF_DA_LINESTYLE.TF_LS_SQUIGGLE
member.summary: The text is underlined with a solid wavy line.
